company_info.Company Description: We “Leom International" (ISO Certified 9001  2015) established in 2014, our head office located in Punjab is very close to Chandigarh Domestic and International Airports. We have our domestic branches in Punjab, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, New Delhi, Uttrakhand, and Rajasthan. Here, Our expertise lies in offering complete support to client companies for meeting the recruitment and staffing needs in industries like, Mechanical and Civil Construction, hospitality etc. The package includes handling complete aspects of profile from sourcing, selection, shortlisting, interviews and recruitment
